title: Show.People.1928.new.soundtrack
description:
Show People (1928)

Directed by King Vidor

with Marion Davies, Willian Haines

An exclusive version with a new soundtrack*

AVI (Generic MPEG-4)
Codec: Xvid
Resolution: 640x480
Frame rate: 23.98 fps
Data size: 1.46 GB
Data rate: 2680.92 kbits/s
Audio: Stereo, 44.100 kHz
English title cards 
Spanish subtitles (srt)
Duration:  1:19:17

"Show People", released the year after the first 'talkie' "The Jazz Singer", is a real 'must' for anyone interested in the entrails of the last Hollywood silent period, with all the wit, sourness and irony involved. Directed by the great King Vidor, "Show People" is a little masterpiece of rare historical value, which also reclaims Marion Davies as a major silent comedy star.

*About this new soundtrack: 

Some sections from the lovely original MGM released musical score and sound effects (which had an appaling audio quality) have been rescued, cleaned and remastered. Also included: several popular songs and jazz pieces of the period, quotations from various light-classical pieces, plus...
